game.name: Offroad Kings Hill Climb Driving
game.description:
Driving a car properly requires keen eyes and good command over the steering wheel. And it becomes really a very daunting affair when you have to ride a car on the mountain hilly tracks. So, are you ready to accept this challenge, friends? Yes, we have got you covered today with a brand new racing challenge where you will get a chance to experience a new kind of driving season. This driving battle is for all those who are skilled enough to reach the finish line first.

This is the first time in your life when you are going to drive multiple car models on the very difficult course in Offroad Kings Hill Climb Driving. Oh my God! There will be dangerous hills, difficult brides to go over and multiple rivers to cross. You can only survive here if you are skilled enough to put your insane driving abilities to the test. Be careful and try to complete your mission as fast as you can since this is a time-based project!

Do not forget to earn money that you see scattered along the way. Choose your car, any mode out of three options including Free Mode, Checkpoint Mode, and Challenge Mode and get ready to enter the realistic driving fun! Ride your chosen vehicle at the pointed area in the limited time when you try out the Time Trial mode! Make sure to maintain a proper balance between turning directions and speeding up. Check out a bit tricky and addictive free car driving simulators and have a blast with your friends!
